lines:
10 April, 1919.

Mr. Sung Sing Kwan

536 Commonwealth Ave.

Boston, Mass.

city dear Kvan:

Your mighty nice letter has just reached me. The cushion 
cover arrived at the house this aiming before I left for the office;

and I can assure you that they are for deeply agra all at ed, all the more

so in view of the fact that they

are designed and embroidered by your

little sight sr. I think that ir 30 american girl at the age of fourteen

in excellence 
or fifteen should accomplish something anyone nearly approaching/the 
190 rk your sit sr has done she would be any stir od from md to end of this 
country as an infant prodigy. The covers will always serve 29 a most 
delightful reminder of a most delightful occasion, and for that reason 
wi12 have a double value.

By all means come out something, and talk over with me the 
big problem which now confront you in connection with your father's ex -
pressed wishes. I don't wonder that you feel a bit at a loss to know 
just what to do. Don's decide hurry ely anyway.

Ever sincerely yours,

I think that ir 30 american girl at the age of fourteen  in excellence  or fifteen should accomplish something anyone nearly approaching/the  190 rk your sit sr has done she would be any stir od from md to end of this  country as an infant prodigy. The covers will always serve 29 a most  delightful reminder of a most delightful occasion, and for that reason  wi12 have a double value.  By all means come out something, and talk over with me the  big problem which now confront you in connection with your father's expressed wishes. I don't wonder that you feel a bit at a loss to know  just what to do. Don's decide hurry ely anyway.  Ever sincerely yours,

metadata.abstract: Letter complimenting the embroidered cushion cover made by Kwan's sister and offer to speak to Kwan about the big problem" with Kwan's father's expressed wishes for Kwan.""etter complimenting the embroidered cushion cover made by Kw"
